qas.question: What is the official name of Cypus?
What is Cyprus' affiliation with the European Union?
Is Cyprus an island country or land-locked country?
What does Cyprus rank in terms of size in the Mediterranean?
Which country is north of Cyprus?

context: Cyprus (i/ˈsaɪprəs/; Greek: Κύπρος IPA: [ˈcipros]; Turkish: Kıbrıs IPA: [ˈkɯbɾɯs]), officially the <a0_0>Republic of Cyprus<a0_0/> (Greek: Κυπριακή Δημοκρατία; Turkish: Kıbrıs Cumhuriyeti), is an <a4_0>island country<a4_0/> in the <a1_0>Eastern Mediterranean Sea<a1_0/>, off the coasts of <a2_0>Syria and Turkey<a2_0/>.[e] Cyprus is the <a5_0>third largest<a5_0/> and third most populous island in the Mediterranean, and a <a3_0>member state<a3_0/> of the European Union. It is located south of <a6_0>Turkey<a6_0/>, west of Syria and Lebanon, northwest of Israel and Palestine, north of Egypt and east of Greece.
